glosses: a fee for grinding or milling (grain, etc.)

examples.text:
Kilo / Cinsi / Münakasa usulü
350000 / Odun (meşe) / Aleni
190000 / Tahniye (ekmek) / "
150000 / Un (Ekmeklik) / Kapalı zarf

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish طحنیه (tahniye), probably a pseudo-Arabic coinage from Arabic طَحْن (ṭaḥn).
